response.original_title: The Story of a Political Dissident: Gregorian Bivolaru
response.overview: About the investigation into the Romanian Gregorian Bivolaru and his yoga federation, the Movement for Spiritual Integration into the Absolute (Misa), that began after reports of psychological manipulation and sexual exploitation within the organisation, according to the official. Former Misa members alerted authorities to the alleged abuses. While other groups were deeply concerned that the fundamental rights of the religious refugee Gregorian Bivolaru were not secure within the EU judicial collaboration. Gregorian Bivolar, born in Romania 1952, is also known as Magnus Aurolsson, or just Grieg, Grig or Guru.
response.title: The Story of a Political Dissident: Gregorian Bivolaru
